hero.title: Nabagram Seva Sangha
hero.description: Discover the timeless elegance of handwoven muslin and silk, crafted by 28 master spinners and 13 skilled weavers from the heart of Murshidabad.

artisan.title: The Pulse of Tradition
artisan.description: Behind every thread lies the dedication of our master craftspeople, preserving techniques passed down through generations.

heritageStory.title: Weaving Stories Since Generations
heritageStory.description1: Nabagram Seva Sangha stands as a testament to the rich textile heritage of Murshidabad. Under the Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC), we empower local artisans while preserving the ancient art of muslin and silk weaving.
heritageStory.description2: From the finest 100-count muslin that once graced royal courts to intricately printed silk sarees, each piece tells a story of patience, skill, and unwavering dedication to quality.
heritageStory.kvicDesc: Authentic Khadi products with government certification

newsletter.title: Join the Heritage Circle
newsletter.description: Be the first to know about new collections, artisan stories, and exclusive offers.

Products.title: Our Collections
Products.description: Explore our curated selection of premium handwoven textiles, crafted by master artisans of Murshidabad.
Products.noProductsDesc: Try adjusting your filters to find what you're looking for.

hero.title: Weaving History
hero.description: Nabagram Seva Sangha is more than a cooperative. It is a guardian of Bengal's textile legacy, weaving dreams in silk and muslin.

origin.title: From the Heart of Murshidabad
origin.desc1: In the historic district of Murshidabad, where the Nawabs once patronized the finest arts, Nabagram Seva Sangha was born with a singular mission: to revive the glory of authentic Khadi.
origin.desc2: Certified by the Khadi and Village Industries Commission (KVIC), we operate as a direct-benefit community. Every thread bought from us contributes directly to the household of a master weaver or spinner.
origin.desc3: Specializing in 100-count Muslin and pure Silk, our fabrics are not manufactured; they are birthed through the rhythm of handlooms that clack from dawn to dusk.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: Principles that guide every warp and weft of our existence.
values.v1Desc: Keeping the ancient art of Muslin weaving alive in its purest form, passed down through generations in Murshidabad.
values.v2Desc: Ensuring fair chances and sustainable livelihoods for our community of weavers under KVIC certification.
values.v3Desc: Using only natural fibers and traditional hand-operated looms that leave zero carbon footprint.

cta.title: Experience the Authenticity
cta.description: Visit us in Murshidabad to see the magic unfold, or bring a piece of heritage home today.

hero.title: We'd Love to Hear From You
hero.description: Whether you are looking for a specific weave, want to place a bulk order, or simply want to visit our weavers in Murshidabad.
